title: Herbert Hoover National Historic Site: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News        Keep up with the latest Hoover news. National Archives & Records Administration           Subscribe  | What is RSS     July 26, 2016  Birthplace Centennial Quilt on Display at Herbert Hoover National Historic Site  The Birthplace Centennial Quilt pays tribute to National Park units in all 50 states, with each square representing a different park.   July 07, 2016  Photographer and Videographer Patricia McInroy Selected as 2016 Artist-in-Residence  Photographer and videographer Patricia McInroy will be the 2016 Artist-in-Residence at Herbert Hoover National Historic Site in August, taking photos and composing videos for the site.   April 29, 2016  Tourism To Herbert Hoover National Historic Site Creates Almost $7.3 Million In Economic Benefits  A new National Park Service report shows that 127,155 visits to Herbert Hoover National Historic Site in 2015 spent $7,281,100 in communities near the park.   April 14, 2016  Herbert Hoover National Historic Site Offers Every Kid in a Park Pass  Herbert Hoover National Historic Site is proud to offer the Every Kid in a Park pass as part of President Obama's commitment to protect our nation's unique outdoor spaces and ensure that every American has the opportunity to visit and enjoy them.               Facebook   Like us on Facebook for news, events, and photos.        Twitter   Follow us on Twitter for news and events.                         Herbert Hoover National Historic Site   8 Photos  High-quality photographs of Herbert Hoover National Historic Site in West Branch, Iowa.
